Update CONTRIBUTING.md

events.body:
NACK use of commas is very subjective (particularly before ["and"](https://www.grammarly.com/blog/comma-before-and/) on lists) and IMHO these additions don't improve readability.

@RajaMBZ effort appreciated though and not meant to discourage. Just adding my 2c.
Well, thank you all for providing your valuable feedback & suggestion(s) in this regard. I'm now closing this PR.
